NewLaunches.name: boAt Airdopes 115
NewLaunches.des: Pro gamer? We got you. A do-it-all hustler? Even better! Airdopes 115 is the perfect choice for both worlds. Its 13mm drivers will make you experience a thumping bass and drown you in the unbeatable boAt Signature Sound. Get the gamer to win matches with minimum lag powered by BEAST™ Mode. Call disturbance will never be an issue with ENx™ technology that makes calls crystal clear for you. So, pick from its dynamic colours & vibe limitless with its 24HRS playback

NewLaunches.name: boAt Airdopes 500 ANC
NewLaunches.des: ap out of chaos & listen to the #SoundThatMatters with Airdopes 500 ANC. The erratic chatter while commuting, the swoosh of the strong winds, and the deafening traffic – tune out of everything and focus on what matters with Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation up to 35dB. Don’t let your words fail you – its Quad Mics & ENx™ Technology ensure your voice is heard as good as in person. And when you’re ready to game, BEAST™ Mode offers seamless gaming with minimal lag. Plug in. Switch on.

actors.name: K L RAHUL
actors.des: When you hear the crowd raor, be assured that it's KL Rahul making his way to the field. Our hardcore boAthead, KL Rahul, hits it with his performance as well as his fashion statement. ON or off field, Rahul always makes #MoveOfTheChampions.

actors.name: RASHMIKA MANDANNA
actors.des: The Queen of sasa & hearts, Rashmika Mandanna is the newly on-board boAthead. Do you know what our boAthead Rashmika & boAt have in common?They both leave you speechless with their mind-boggling performance.
